thread.title: Canadian Party Leaders Spar Over Economy in Debate
thread.title_full: Canadian Party Leaders Spar Over Economy in Debate - WSJ

author: Paul Vieira
title: Canadian Party Leaders Spar Over Economy in Debate
text:
OTTAWA—Canadian Prime Minister Stephen Harper, fighting for his political career ahead of an Oct. 19 vote, warned Thursday in a party-leaders’ debate that his rivals pose a risk to the country’s fragile economy through planned tax increases and a return to deficit spending.
“We are living in a terribly unstable and risky global economy,” he said at the debate in Calgary, Alberta, the financial nerve center of Canada’s energy...
